name: Los Hermanos Subida
description:
Try to reach the top of the mountain without drowning at the sea! Controls:
  • A to grab at the rocks or at the other characther's hand (use it for the RED shirt characther)
  • L to grab at the rocks or at the other characther's hand (use it for the YELLOW shirt characther)
  • SPACE to start the game
  • ESC to exit
Instant co-op gameplay:

Just share a keyboard with a friend: there are two characther to control, so you can control one of the "hermanos" and your friend can control the other one!

Sorry for my bad translation in English and Spanish, I've done them in a very short time..
